snippet.title: Battle Balls - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1025900/Battle_Balls/

Watch the early access trailer for Battle Balls, a game developed by Fonderland Studios. Battle your friends with balls and play from over 20 exciting mini-games! Battle Balls is available in Early Access for PC (Steam) on January 10th.
